Posts.Content: Feb 9, 2012 08:53AM akg wrote: I was so happy to see this forum!  I lost my eyebrows and lashes post chemo, as I see many of you did.  They actually started thinning once I started femara/letrozole.  My hair was slow coming back in and has stalled at a stage too bald for public display.  I finished chemo treatments April '10.  I am very discouraged.  Has anyone else had these problems this far out?
